text: Arau sihamtara majara kichumane tomara katha kana pati sune, kintu ami sihamtara antarata ararana karai dicho yate sihamte seya upalabdhi karaiba noraarae, arau sihamtara kanata ache badhirata. Yadi gote'i ayato sihamte pratyaksa karae tathapi'o sihamte imana naniba. Anaki sihamte yetiya tomara ocarata upasthita haya, tetiya sihamte tomara lagata birkata lipta haya, yisakale kupharai karaiche sihamte kaya, â€˜eyato agara dinara upakathara bahirae ana eko nahayaâ€™
